member.name: INamedPropertyStore.GetNameAt
member.summary: Gets the name of a property at a specified index in the property store.
member.param: The index of the property in the store.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the property's name. It is the calling application's responsibility to free this resource when it is no longer needed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INamedPropertyStore.GetNameCount
member.summary: Gets the number of property names in the property store.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the count of names.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INamedPropertyStore.GetNamedValue
member.summary: Gets the value of a named property from the named property store.
member.param: A pointer to the property name, as a Unicode string, of the property in the named property store.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to a structure that holds the property's value.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.
If the property named in pszName is not found in the property store, this method returns S_OK and the pv member is set to VT_EMPTY.

member.name: INamedPropertyStore.SetNamedValue
member.summary: Sets the value of a named property.
member.param: A pointer to the property name, as a Unicode string, in the named property store.
A pointer to a structure that contains the value to set for the property named in pszName.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INamedPropertyStore
member.summary: Exposes methods that get and set named properties.
